name: Finding My Way
description:
"Moving away from a place you've known all of your life is hard. Slap a coming of age experience and an identity crisis on top of it creates a very unpleasant but interesting experience in the transition to adulthood."

-

Finding My Way is a personal project that I can personally relate to. As of right now I have no plans on publishing it anywhere. Who knows? If it becomes popular enough and the demand is high enough when it's completed I might think about it.

-

I would like to thank Harry Mill for the beautiful music that can be heard in the game. Also a special shoutout to @rake.park  for her help on the soundtrack "Time Alone" Here are there socials go check them out <3 <3
